name: Social Tycoon
description:
Welcome to Social Tycoon!

Tired of your office job, you head out with some cash from investors with a bright idea for a new social network. Manage your resources cleverly, making sure that your network is safe and functional.

Features

  • Manage your cash and avoid bankruptcy
  • Juggle developers and moderators to keep your platform running
  • Keep investors happy by releasing new features
  • A soundtrack, provided by Incompetech!

Disclaimer

This game is in a very early beta, and so many things are likely to not work, and the gameplay is still quite light. If you have suggestions/problems then please let me know.

Attribution
